content.name: Adrian
content.task: Group processes- Wrote two paragraphs on the group processes section of the team profile. The first paragraph entailed what worked well for the group in assignment 2 and areas that could be improved such as communication between group members and allocation of work load. The second paragraph was about how we would implement these possible improvements moving into assignment 3 such as having a Trello board for work allocation.

Overview -
Within this first week I completed the Overview; involving around 5 paragraphs that  summarised our project, including the Topic; covering the basic idea of what our project is, Motivation; I covered the main purpose of our project and the Landscape; discussing what our project will look like and the competitors in the market.
